actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To require that District of Columbia prisoners incarcerated at the District Correctional Complex in Lorton, Virginia be treated as residents of the District of Columbia for purposes of the decennial census of population.
short_title: District of Columbia Census Equity Act of 1990

summary.text: District of Columbia Census Equity Act of 1990 - Directs the Secretary of Commerce to count prisoners at the District of Columbia Correctional Complex at Lorton, Virginia, as D.C. residents in tabulating the population of the States in the decennial census.

titles.title: District of Columbia Census Equity Act of 1990

To require that District of Columbia prisoners incarcerated at the District Correctional Complex in Lorton, Virginia be treated as residents of the District of Columbia for purposes of the decennial census of population.
